# Soybeans

**Category:** Agriculture  
**Origin:** India, Tanzania  
**Grade:** Non-GMO, GMO available

## Product Description

High-quality soybeans for food and feed applications. Sourced from reliable farming cooperatives with full traceability and quality documentation.

## Specifications

| Parameter | Value |
|-----------|-------|
| Moisture | Max 13% |
| Protein | Min 35% |
| Oil Content | Min 18% |
| Foreign Matter | Max 1% |
| Broken/Split | Max 2% |

## Packaging & Delivery

- **Packaging:** 25kg or 50kg bags, bulk containers
- **Delivery Terms:** FOB, CIF, DAP
- **Minimum Order:** 200 MT
- **Lead Time:** 20-30 days

## Applications

- Oil extraction
- Soy meal production
- Food processing
- Animal feed

## Certifications

- Non-GMO certification available
- Organic options available
- Halal certified
